alert.note: Alert for Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 24 at 6:16PM MDT until June 25 at 2:00AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of south central South Dakota, including the following counties, Mellette and Todd. * WHEN...Until 1100 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and normally dry areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 714 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Horse Creek, White Thunder Creek, Antelope Creek, Oak Creek, Little Oak Creek, White Horse Creek, and Horse Head Creek. Scattered showers and storms will be possible this evening and overnight. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Mission and northeastern Rosebud Reservation.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
